description:
Finally! A course designed for the absolute beginner. I will virtually take you by the hand and show you how to get a WordPress site up and running without overloading you with too much mind-numbing technical information. Whether you need a professional-looking, mobile-friendly site for your business or non-profit but do not have the money to hire a web developer, work for a small business and have been put in charge of creating your company's website, are an 80 year old great-grandmother wanting to start a web development business on the side or just want to take advantage of the FREE tools available...this course is for YOU.

That's right! This course includes some FREE tools valued at approx. $100 dollars that will make your website look awesome. You get a FREE domain name to start. I've included a FREE premium theme (layout & design template) and a FREE powerful social media plugin (adds more features to promote your website).

About the course During the course, you will learn how to build a WordPress website from scratch even if you are a complete beginner. Over the duration of this course you will build a full website by following step-by-step instructions. NO CODING ALLOWED.

Who should take this course? This WordPress course is designed for anyone who wants to build and maintain websites and blogs using WordPress. If you have a dream of being your own boss, need a source to earn extra income, would like to gain a promotion at your job, need to market a product, or just have the desire to learn something fun and new then you will definitely benefit from this course.

Prerequisites There are no prerequisites for this WordPress course. However, you should have general computer skills and access to the Internet.
title: Beginner's Guide to Creating an Awesome Website in WordPress
